headline: Strawberry Cream Cheese Cobbler
description: This recipe for a strawberries and cream cheese cobbler creates a fresh, naturally delicious combination in a dessert that is easy and irresistible.
name: Strawberry Cream Cheese Cobbler
recipeIngredient: 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Pour melted butter into the bottom of a 9x13-inch glass baking dish.

Mix milk, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a small bowl; pour over butter in the baking dish. Arrange strawberry halves in a layer in the baking dish. Dot strawberries with cream cheese pieces.
Bake in the preheated oven until the top is golden brown and the edges are bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes.
